background.text: ORDER BELOW EXH.1 IN CRIMINAL BAIL APPLN NO. 169/2019 Perused the bail application of Omkar Shankar Roman and say thereon. Perused case diary. Heard the learned Advocate Shri. Satish Kamble for the applicant / accused and APP Shri. Khan for the State. committed an offence punishable under Sec/s. 306 34 143, 147, 148 of Indian Penal Code and u/S 4/25 of Arms Act and 37(1) / 135 of Maharashtra Police Act, which registered as CR No. 334/2018 with Vishrambag Police Station.

legalActFound.stringMatched: under sec/s. 306 34 143, 147, 148 of indian penal code

legalAct.actShortNameList: Bombay Police Act,Mumbai Police Act,Maharashtra Police Act,B. P.Act,B.P.Act,B.P. Act.

arguments.text: 2] It is the case of the Prosecution that on 16.11.2018 at about 9.00 a.m at Shaniwar Wada near Bajirao statue informant Shubham Rajesh Bhosale along with his friends Aayush, Yogesh, Ram Sharma, were celebrating birthday of Yogesh Kale and Raj Sharma. At that time Pavan Dhile, Toufiq Bholawale, Sourabh Jadhav and Omkar Roman came there. Toufiq Bholawale picked the quarrel and tried to kill Shubham Bhosale. When his friends intervened, they were assaulted with stone and iron weapon, thereby, committed an offence punishable under Sec/s. 306 34 143, 147, 148 of Indian Penal Code and u/S 4/25 of Arms Act and 37(1) / 135 of Maharashtra Police Act, which registered as CR No. 334/2018 with Vishrambag Police Station.

argumentSentences.text: 2] It is the case of the Prosecution that on 16.11.2018 at about 9.00 a.m at Shaniwar Wada near Bajirao statue informant Shubham Rajesh Bhosale along with his friends Aayush, Yogesh, Ram Sharma, were celebrating birthday of Yogesh Kale and Raj Sharma.
At that time Pavan Dhile, Toufiq Bholawale, Sourabh Jadhav and Omkar Roman came there.
Toufiq Bholawale picked the quarrel and tried to kill Shubham Bhosale.

When his friends intervened, they were assaulted with stone and iron weapon, thereby, committed an offence punishable under Sec/s. 306 34 143, 147, 148 of Indian Penal Code and u/S 4/25 of Arms Act and 37(1) / 135 of Maharashtra Police Act, which registered as CR No. 334/2018 with Vishrambag Police Station.

arguments.text: 3] The learned Counsel Shri. Satish Kamble for the applicant submitted that the role of the applicant is shown that he has assaulted to the witnesses by picking up stone from the spot. No stones were recovered. There is no discovery. There are no antecedents. He is electric contractor. Complainant is a habitual offender.

argumentSentences.text: Satish Kamble for the applicant submitted that the role of the applicant is shown that he has assaulted to the witnesses by picking up stone from the spot.

arguments.text: 4] Learned APP submitted that name and role of the applicant is mentioned in the FIR. Applicant has assaulted the wintesses by stone. Stones were seized from the spot. Investigation is in progress. Applicant may tamper the evidence.

argumentSentences.text: 4] Learned APP submitted that name and role of the applicant is mentioned in the FIR.
Applicant has assaulted the wintesses by stone.
Stones were seized from the spot.

arguments.text: 5] Name of the applicant is figured in FIR. Nothing is recovered from him. Property is recovered from co­accused. Injured is discharged from hospital and he is out of danger of his life. Therefore, in my view further custody of the applicant accused is not required. Co­accused is released on bail. Hence, the order.

argumentSentences.text: 5] Name of the applicant is figured in FIR.
Injured is discharged from hospital and he is out of danger of his life.
Therefore, in my view further custody of the applicant accused is not required.

order.text: ORDER 1] Accused Omkar Shankar Roman be enlarged on PR Bond of Rs. 20,000/­ with one or two sureties in like amount on following conditions. 1] He shall remain present before the Court on each and every date for facing trial. 2] He shall not tamper the prosecution evidence and he shall maintain peace in the society. 3] He shall not commit any other or further offence. 4] Applicant shall visit Investigating Officer in police station on each Wednesday during 3.00 p.m. to 5.00 p.m to help in investigation till charge sheet is filed. 5] In default any of the condition bail shall automatically forfeited to the Government without notice to the accused. 2] Bail before concerned Court.

processedText:
CNR­MHPU01­000644­2019 
---header-ends---
ORDER BELOW EXH.1 IN CRIMINAL BAIL APPLN NO. 169/2019 Perused the bail application of Omkar Shankar Roman and say thereon. Perused case diary. Heard the learned Advocate Shri. Satish Kamble for the applicant / accused and APP Shri. Khan for the State. committed an offence punishable under Sec/s. 306 34 143, 147, 148 of Indian Penal Code and u/S 4/25 of Arms Act and 37(1) / 135 of Maharashtra Police Act, which registered as CR No. 334/2018 with Vishrambag Police Station. 
---background-ends---
2] It is the case of the Prosecution that on 16.11.2018 at about 9.00 a.m at Shaniwar Wada near Bajirao statue informant Shubham Rajesh Bhosale along with his friends Aayush, Yogesh, Ram Sharma, were celebrating birthday of Yogesh Kale and Raj Sharma. At that time Pavan Dhile, Toufiq Bholawale, Sourabh Jadhav and Omkar Roman came there. Toufiq Bholawale picked the quarrel and tried to kill Shubham Bhosale. When his friends intervened, they were assaulted with stone and iron weapon, thereby, committed an offence punishable under Sec/s. 306 34 143, 147, 148 of Indian Penal Code and u/S 4/25 of Arms Act and 37(1) / 135 of Maharashtra Police Act, which registered as CR No. 334/2018 with Vishrambag Police Station. 
---argument-ends---
3] The learned Counsel Shri. Satish Kamble for the applicant submitted that the role of the applicant is shown that he has assaulted to the witnesses by picking up stone from the spot. No stones were recovered. There is no discovery. There are no antecedents. He is electric contractor. Complainant is a habitual offender. 
---argument-ends---
4] Learned APP submitted that name and role of the applicant is mentioned in the FIR. Applicant has assaulted the wintesses by stone. Stones were seized from the spot. Investigation is in progress. Applicant may tamper the evidence. 
---argument-ends---
5] Name of the applicant is figured in FIR. Nothing is recovered from him. Property is recovered from co­accused. Injured is discharged from hospital and he is out of danger of his life. Therefore, in my view further custody of the applicant accused is not required. Co­accused is released on bail. Hence, the order. 
---argument-ends---
ORDER 1] Accused Omkar Shankar Roman be enlarged on PR Bond of Rs. 20,000/­ with one or two sureties in like amount on following conditions. 1] He shall remain present before the Court on each and every date for facing trial. 2] He shall not tamper the prosecution evidence and he shall maintain peace in the society. 3] He shall not commit any other or further offence. 4] Applicant shall visit Investigating Officer in police station on each Wednesday during 3.00 p.m. to 5.00 p.m to help in investigation till charge sheet is filed. 5] In default any of the condition bail shall automatically forfeited to the Government without notice to the accused. 2] Bail before concerned Court. 
---order-ends---
